note.p: Police officer. Arrived in the Isle of Wight between 1846 and 1849. At Gatten, Shanklin, Isle of Wight, 1851; Everton, 1861; Hambledon, 1871; Romsey, 1881; Crondall, 1891; Fleet, 1901.

Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1664/447/6),1861 (RG9/665/28/12), 1871 (RG10/1217/50/1), 1881 (RG11/1224/40/7), 1891 (RG12/953/168/30), 1901 (RG13/1101/104/20)
